verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Sing them over again to me, Wonderful words of Life; Let me more of their beauty see, Wonderful words of Life. Words of life and beauty, Teach me faith and duty:

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Beautiful words, wonderful words, Wonderful words of Life. Beautiful words, wonderful words, Wonderful words of Life.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Christ, the blessed One, gives to all, Wonderful words of Life; Sinner, list to the loving call, Wonderful words of Life. All so freely given, Wooing us to Heaven:

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Sweetly echo the gospel call, Wonderful words of Life, Offer pardon and peace to all, Wonderful words of Life. Jesus, only Savior, Sanctify for ever:
